oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bab Zuwaila as seen from Sharia al-Muizz

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Collector's note: 24 Bâb Zowaïlah (Porte de la ville) Vue generale du Nord - The Bāb Zuwayla, from within. Translation of note: 24 Bab Zuwayla (Door of the city) General view from North.
